long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
** Please do not leave 1* feedback if your printer is not compatible with this app. Your printer needs specific technical features for this app to work. Instead raise a support ticket asking for your printer make/model to be supported **


  Got a WiFi/network printer? - You need this app !
  Got a Chromebook?   - You *definitely* 
                                           need this app !

'WiFi printer driver for Chrome and Chromebooks' adds local network printing to Chrome for compatible printers.

Documents do not go through Google Cloud Print, instead are sent directly to the printer.

New feature: Ink/toner level graphs, $2 in-app upgrade.

* Compatible printers are automatically discovered.
* Many printers are compatible, but don't advertise it. You can still try to print to these printers at your own risk.
* Some printers are flat-out incompatible, please don't leave a 1* review, as this is not my fault, please create a support request with your make/model instead.


If this app works for you, great! - everyone's happy, please leave a 5* review.

Happy printing!

Please note that this application is not affiliated with or supported by any of the printer manufacturers or Google.
